packet.name: ARP
packet.descripton: Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) is a protocol used for resolution of network layer addresses into link layer addresses.

field.name: ProtocolType
field.description: Specifies the internetwork protocol for which the ARP request is intended.

field.name: HardwareSize
field.description: Length (in octets) of a hardware address.

field.name: ProtocolSize
field.description: Length (in octets) of addresses used in the upper layer protocol. (The upper layer protocol specified in ProtocolType)

field.name: Opcode
field.description: Specifies the operation that the sender is performing: 1 for request, 2 for reply.

field.name: TargetHardwareAddress
field.description: Media address of the intended receiver. This field is ignored in requests.

field.name: TargetProtocolAddress
field.description: internetwork address of the intended receiver.
